TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Legend extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 代表圖表影像的圖例。

span.span: Represents the legend for the chart image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會封裝的所有功能控制項的圖例，並使用公開根集合屬性物件。The class encapsulates all the functionality of the control's legend, and is exposed using the collection property of the root object. 可以有任意數目的圖表影像的圖例。There can be any number of legends for a chart image. 圖例可以：Legends can: - 停駐和對齊。Be docked and aligned. - 內部或繪製的圖表區域外部顯示。Be displayed inside or outside the plotted chart areas. - 自動符合其內容。Automatically fit their contents. - 使用預先定義的樣式，例如資料列、 資料行或資料表。Use a predefined style, such as row, column or table. - 使用影線、 漸層色彩和背景影像。Use hatching, gradient colors and background images. - 調整大小並放在圖表影像內的任何位置。Be sized and positioned anywhere within the chart image. 圖例項目都由物件，並為預設或自訂的項目。Legend items are represented by the object, and are either default or custom items. 自訂項目不會產生關聯的資料，並可以新增、 刪除和修改屬性。Custom items are not associated with data, and can be added, deleted and modified using the property. 預設項目預設會自動加入圖例中，而且是環圈圖和圓形圖繪製的資料點的名稱。Default items are by default automatically added to the legend, and are the names of the plotted data points for doughnut and pie charts. 對於所有其他圖表類型，預設項目會是繪製的資料數列的名稱。For all other chart types, the default items are the names of the plotted data series. 每個數列都屬性，定義將用於圖例的名稱。Each series has a property that defines the name of the legend that will be used. 圖例項目將不會建立一系列如果屬性設定為`false`。A legend item will not be created for a series if the property is set to `false`. 可以使用變更這些預設項目的文字屬性。The text for these default items can be changed using the property. 這個屬性可讓您指定預先定義的關鍵字，將會取代其適當的值，在執行階段。This property will allow you to specify predefined keywords that will be replaced by their appropriate values at run-time. 如果您有一個圓形圖 」 圖表，而且設定屬性，它就也設定圖例文字為您設定標籤的值。If you have a pie chart and you set the property, it will also set the legend text to the value you set for the labels. 如果您想要將文字設定為不同的值，您可以設定屬性。If you want to set the text to a different value, you can set the property. 在大部分情況下，您會想要設定"#AXISLABEL 」 或 「 #VALX"的屬性。In most cases, you would want to set the property to "#AXISLABEL" or "#VALX". 圖例數列符號是矩形、 逗點或線條。Legend series symbols are rectangles, dots or lines. 符號類型的圖表會自動設定，並繪製的圖表類型而定。The symbol type is set automatically by the chart and depends on the plotted chart type. 預設圖例文字自動調整大小。Legend text by default is automatically sized. 您可以停用連線，停用自動調整大小圖例文字的屬性。You can disable automatic sizing of legend text by disabling the property. 當這個屬性設定為`false`，圖例文字的大小取決於圖例的大小屬性。When this property is set to `false`, the size of the legend text is determined by the Size property of the legend . 如果啟用屬性，屬性決定圖例項目可以有在調整大小時的最小字型大小。If the property is enabled, the property determines the minimum font size that a legend item can have when resizing. 屬性會定義可以在同一行顯示的文字換行到另一行之前的字元數目限制。The property defines a limit on the number of characters that can be shown on one line before text is wrapped to another line. 如果您不想將文字換行圖例中，將值設定屬性設為零。If you do not wish to wrap text in the legend, set the value of the property to zero. 根據預設，當整個圖例文字無法容納在圖例中，文字會被截斷。By default, when the entire legend text does not fit in the legend, the text will be truncated. 您可以設定的圖例，若要取得的文字換行而不是被截斷。You can set the on the legend to get the text to wrap instead of being truncated. 如果圖例的內容無法放入指定的空間，圖例項目會被截斷。If the contents of the legend cannot fit into the given space, legend entries are truncated. 省略符號表示還有更多的項目比圖例有空間供顯示。An ellipsis is shown to indicate that there are more entries than the legend has space for. 若要避免的圖例項目遭到截斷，將設定的位置和大小圖例使用屬性。To prevent the legend items from being truncated, set the position and size of the legend using the property. 設定時的圖例位置或大小，圖表不會再自動可以在圖表中放置項目。When setting the legend position or size, the chart can no longer automatically position the elements in the chart. 在某些情況下，您有許多需要以手動方式放置其他圖表項目，以達到所需的外觀。In some cases, you many need to manually position other chart elements to achieve the desired appearance. 另一個選項是定義您自己的資料格資料行，而不是使用預設圖例。Another option would be to define your own cell columns instead of using the default legend settings. 物件具有 CellColumn 集合; 每個 CellColumn 物件表示圖例中的資料行。The object has a CellColumn Collection; each CellColumn object represents a column in the Legend. 資料格資料行具有和可用來調整大小的資料行的屬性。A cell column has and properties that can be used to adjust the size of the columns. 當圖例會包含多項目，可用來改善可讀性。When the legend contains many entries, can be used to improve readability. 當這個屬性設定為 True 時，它會顯示您可以使用設定背景色彩屬性。When this property is set to True, it will display a back color that you can set using the property. 根據預設，圖例位於圖表右上角。By default, the legend is positioned in the top-right corner of the chart. 這個位置可以使用來修改和圖例的內容。This position can be modified by using the and properties of the legend. 圖例也可以使用關聯與圖表區域屬性。The legend can also be associated with a chart area by use of the property. 此屬性會指定讓圖例應該停駐之圖表區域的名稱。This property specifies the name of the chart area for which the legend should be docked. 颾魤 ㄛ屬性可以用來顯示圖表區域內圖例。In addition, the property can be used to display the legend inside a chart area. 當設為 False，屬性會定義百分比，圖例會自動定位時可用的圖表中圖例的大小上限。When is set to False, the property defines the maximum size, in percent, of the legend within the available chart when the legend is automatically positioned. 如果您想要調整的寬度或高度的圖例停駐的內容已設定之後，就應該設定這個屬性。This property should be set if you wish to adjust the width or height of the legend after the docking properties have been set. 可以使用修改圖例事件。The legend can be modified using the event.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例的對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the legend.

value.span: .NET Framework 列舉值，代表圖例的對齊方式。

span.span: A .NET Framework enumeration value that represents the alignment of the legend.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 圖例可以讓您可對齊，或是; 其對齊方式也會受到屬性設定。The legend can be aligned so that it is , or ; its alignment is also affected by the property setting. 如果圖例停駐在頂部或底部是左邊; 如果它停駐在左邊或右邊，位於最上層。If the legend is docked to the top or bottom, is to the left; if it is docked to the left or right, is at the top. 屬性設定為剛好相反，並將對齊圖例的右方或下方，根據它停駐的位置。The property setting is just the opposite, and aligns the legend to the right or the bottom, depending on where it is docked. 一律將置中圖例中，水平或垂直。 always centers the legend, either vertically or horizontally. 設定屬性會有任何作用，如果屬性未設定為。Setting the property will have no effect if the property is not set to .

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum font size that can be used by the autofitting algorithm for the legend text.

span.span: An value that represents the minimum font size that can be used by the autofitting algorithm for the legend text.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例的背景色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of a legend.

value.span: 值，用於繪製圖例的背景色彩。

span.span: A value used to draw the background color of a legend.

value.span: 預設色彩為 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍） 值來設定這個屬性。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 值將會是如果您已指定背景漸層色彩使用的第一個色彩。The value will be the first color used if you have specified gradient colors for the background. Alpha 值會控制色彩的不透明度。The alpha value controls the opacity of a color. 如果您設定此色彩為 「 透明 」-也就是如果您使用 alpha 值為 0-沒有色彩將會指派給圖例的背景。If you set this color to "transparent" - that is, if you use an alpha value of 0 - no color will be assigned to the background of the legend. 如此一來，背景就是透明的。As a result, the background will be transparent.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle BackGradientStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例背景漸層的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a legend.

summary.span: 此外，也會判斷是否使用漸層。

span.span: Also determines whether a gradient is used.

value.span: 指定圖例背景漸層方向的 列舉。

span.span: A enumeration that specifies the orientation for the background gradient of a legend.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用判斷圖例會顯示在漸層，及以決定漸層的方向，如果有一個使用的屬性。Use the property to determine whether a legend will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used. 如需可用的模式的清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a listing of available patterns, refer to the enumeration. 若要使用漸層色彩：To use gradient colors: 設定圖例背景使用的主要色彩屬性。Set the primary color of the legend background with the property. 設定圖例背景次要色彩屬性。Set the secondary color of the legend background with the property. 設定此的所需的漸層樣式的屬性。Set this property to the desired gradient style.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle BackHatchStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle value); };

get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例的影線樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style of a legend.

value.span: 指定圖例影線樣式的 列舉。

span.span: A enumeration that specifies the hatching style of a legend.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉會指定使用類型的筆刷的影線樣式。The enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type . 規劃圖樣包含透明的背景色彩和背景上繪製線條。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 如需可用的影線樣式的清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the enumeration. **附註**影線線條的色彩由屬性。**Note** The color of hatching lines is determined by the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例的背景影像。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image of a legend.

value.span: 值，表示影像檔案的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the URL of an image file.

value.span: 預設值為空字串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性定義的背景影像路徑圖例中，而且可以是絕對或相對的 URL。This property defines a path to a background image for a legend, and can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要調整影像的位置，請使用和屬性。To position the image, use the and properties. 您也可以指定其中一個設定為 「 透明 」 映像所顯示的色彩屬性。You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the property. 從任何支援的.NET Framework，包括圖示的有效圖形檔產生映像。An image can originate from any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 背景影像的優先順序高於其他背景屬性，例如漸層停駐的色彩。Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.

span.span: Gets or sets the background image alignment used for the drawing mode.

value.span: 指定背景影像對齊的 列舉值。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the background image alignment.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定圖例; 的背景影像的對齊方式它會套用的時，才屬性設定為。This property determines the alignment of the background image for the legend; it is only applied when the property is set to .

span.span: Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例背景影像的繪製模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the legend background image drawing mode.

value.span: 指定圖例背景影像繪圖模式的 列舉值。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the legend background image drawing mode.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您決定如何顯示映像，映像可以並排顯示，縮放，等等。The property determines how the image is displayed; the image can be tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果調整映像，將會自動縮放以符合圖例的範圍內。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the legend. 如果影像會並排顯示，它會重複繪製，從圖例的左上角開始。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the legend. 如需可用文繞圖模式的詳細資訊，請參閱列舉主題。For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果屬性設定為，其中繪製影像的位置由屬性設定。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn is determined by the property setting.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例背景的次要色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of a legend background.

value.span: 值，用於具有影線或漸層填滿的次要背景色彩。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of background with hatching or gradient fill.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定次要背景色彩的許多物件，並套用漸層色彩時，會使用。The property determines the secondary background color of many objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied. 您可以設定任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍） 值。You can set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用影線，屬性會決定圖例影線線的色彩。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines for the legend. 要用於圖例的背景漸層色彩：To use gradient colors for the background of a legend: - 設定使用的主要色彩屬性。Set the primary color with the property. - 設定與次要色彩屬性。Set the secondary color with the property. - 設定的所需的漸層樣式的屬性。Set the property to the desired gradient style.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例的框線樣式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個集合屬性可以用來加入、 刪除或修改自訂圖例項目中。This collection property can be used to add, delete or modify custom legend items. 自訂圖例項目，與預設圖例項目，並沒有相關聯的數列或資料點。Custom legend items, unlike default legend items, do not have associated series or data points. 若要修改的圖例項目，請使用事件。To modify legend items, use the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以固定到頂端、 左邊、 底部或右邊的整個圖表影像或內部或圖表區域外部。The can be docked to the top, left, bottom or right of either the entire chart image, or the inside or outside of a chart area. 如果屬性設定為`false`，停駐套用至整個圖表影像。If the property is set to `false`, docking applies to the entire chart image. 如果屬性設定為`true`，停駐適用於所指定的物件屬性If the property is set to `true`, docking applies to the object specified by the property 如果這個屬性就不會影響屬性未設定為。This property has no effect if the property is not set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您嘗試變更這個屬性物件在執行階段，就會發生編譯錯誤。If you attempt to change the properties of this object at run time, a compilation error will occur. 若要在執行階段設定字型屬性，您必須建立新物件。To set font properties at run time, you must create a new object. > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定 Legend.Font.Size 屬性屬性會設定為 false。If you set the Legend.Font.Size property, the property will be set to false. 此外，如果您將設定屬性設為 true，這個屬性會重設為其預設值為 8 的點。Also, if you set the property to true, this property will be reset to its default, which is 8 points.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定圖例項目的顯示順序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the order in which legend items are displayed.

summary.span: 這個屬性只會影響自動為圖表數列加入的圖例項目，並不會影響自訂圖例項目。

span.span: This property only affects legend items automatically added for the chart series; it has no effect on custom legend items.

value.span: 列舉值，指定圖例項目的顯示順序。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the order in which legend items are displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為，如果習慣 StackedColumn、 StackedColumn100、 StackedArea 或 StackedArea100 圖表類型，將會自動反轉圖例。If the property is set to , the legend will automatically be reversed if StackedColumn, StackedColumn100, StackedArea or StackedArea100 chart types are used.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendStyle LegendStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendStyle value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例的樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the legend.

value.span: 決定圖例樣式的 列舉值。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the legend style.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，圖例會顯示為一系列的資料表中的項目。By default, the legend is displayed as a series of items in a table. 您可以指定是否要展開藉由設定資料表中的項目 width-wise 或 height-wise屬性。You can specify whether to expand items in the table width-wise or height-wise by setting the property. 當屬性設定為，則控制項將會判斷是否要繪製寬型資料表或高型資料表，根據的對齊方式和位置的圖表。When the property is set to , the control will determine whether to draw a wide table or a tall table, depending on the alignment and positioning of the chart. 這可能會導致要使用多個圖例項目資料行來繪製的圖例。This may cause the legend to be drawn using multiple legend item columns. 有三個可能的圖例樣式：資料行、 資料列和資料表。There are three possible styles for a legend: Column, Row and Table. 請參閱下表摘要這些樣式：Refer to the table below for a summary of these styles: |樣式Style|描述Description| |-|-| |資料行Column|圖例項目會顯示在具有多個資料列的一個資料行。Legend items are displayed in one column, with multiple rows. 圖例停駐在左邊或右邊的圖表時，最常使用。Most commonly used when the legend is docked to the left or right of the chart.| |表格列Row|圖例項目會顯示在具有多個資料行的一個資料列。Legend items are displayed in one row, with multiple columns. 圖例停駐在頂部或底部的圖表時，最常使用。Most commonly used when the legend is docked to the top or bottom of the chart.| |資料表Table|圖例項目會顯示使用多個資料行和資料列。Legend items are displayed using multiple columns and rows.|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float MaximumAutoSize { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.MaximumAutoSize : single with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例的大小上限，以圖表區域的百分比表示。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the legend, measured as a percentage of the chart area.

summary.span: 自動配置演算法會使用這個值。

span.span: This value is used by the automatic layout algorithm.

value.span: A值，表示圖例的大小上限。

span.span: A value that represents the maximum size of the legend.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果圖例停駐於圖表區域的左右，此屬性會決定圖例中，以圖表區域的百分比的最大寬度。If the legend is docked to the left or right of the chart area, this property determines the maximum width of the legend, which is measured as a percentage of the chart area. 如果圖例停駐在頂部或底部，此屬性會決定圖例中，也會以百分比表示的最大高度。If the legend is docked to the top or bottom, this property determines the maximum height of the legend, which is also measured as a percentage.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ Position { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件，這個物件可用來取得或設定圖例的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets an object, which can be used to get or set the position of the legend.

value.span: 如果 屬性為自動 (亦即 Legend.Position.Auto = )，則圖例位置是由 控制項自動計算 (、 和 屬性設定一併納入考量)。

span.span: If the property is automatic (that is, Legend.Position.Auto = ) the legend position is calculated automatically by the control, taking into account the , and property settings.

value.span: 如果不是自動，則會忽略 、 和 屬性，由傳回之 物件的值單獨決定圖例位置。

span.span: If it is not automatic, the , and properties are ignored, and the legend position is solely determined by the value of the returned object.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例的陰影色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow color of the legend.

value.span: 指定圖例陰影色彩的 值。

span.span: A value that specifies the shadow color of the legend.

value.span: 預設色彩為 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以設定為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍） 值。This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. Alpha 值可用來達到 「 真實 」 的遮蔽效果;請嘗試 「 128,0,0,0"陰影的色彩值。The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try a color value of "128,0,0,0" for shadows. 若要實作一個陰影，將屬性為零 (0) 以外的值。To implement a shadow, set the property to a value other than zero (0).

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例的陰影位移 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of the legend.

value.span: 值，表示圖例的陰影位移 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: An value that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the legend.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要實作的遮蔽功能，請將這個屬性設為零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, set this property to a value other than zero (0). 正值會移到右邊; 陰影負值會導致移位至左邊的陰影。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right; a negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.

summary.span: 取得或設定在文字換行之前可循序顯示在圖例中的字元數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of characters that can be sequentially displayed in the legend before the text is wrapped.

value.span: 值，表示在文字換行之前可循序放入圖例中的字元數目。

span.span: An value that represents the number of characters that can be placed in the legend sequentially before the text is wrapped.

value.span: 預設值為 25。

span.span: The default value is 25.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當圖例文字超過這個屬性所指定的值時，文字將會自動換行時遇到下一個空格字元。When the legend text exceeds the value specified by this property, text will be automatically wrapped when the next white-space character is encountered. 如果文字中不有任何空格字元，不會包裝文字。Text will not be wrapped if there are no white-space characters in the text. 設定屬性為零可停用此功能。Set the property to zero to disable the feature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可用來設定圖例標題的字型屬性。This property can be used to set font properties of the legend title. 如果您嘗試變更這個屬性物件在執行階段，就會發生編譯錯誤。If you attempt to change the properties of this object at run time, a compilation error will occur. 若要在執行階段設定字型屬性，您必須建立新物件。To set font properties at run time, you must create a new object.
